metadata.title: CVE-2014-9474 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Buffer overflow in the mpfr_strtofr function in GNU MPFR before 3.1.2-p11allows context-dependent attackers to have unspecified impact via vectorsrelated to incorrect documentation for mpn_set_str.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9474` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmpfr4 - 3.1.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mpfr4 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-2').
